snippet: The council voted, 5-2, to end its agreement with the team, adding another chapter to the franchise’s tumultuous history in Arizona.
abstract: Glendale City Council in Arizona votes, 4-3, to terminate its lease agreement with Arizona Coyotes at Gila River Arena; decision puts franchise at risk.
lead_paragraph: The council voted, 5-2, to end its agreement with the team, adding another chapter to the franchise’s tumultuous history in Arizona.

headline.main: City Council in Arizona Votes to End Coyotes’ Arena Lease
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Hockey; Coyotes’ Lease Canceled
